text:
Hi,

The <style> docs claim that the default extension is "html". Actually, the
default is ".html". The parameter examples and the end perpetuate this mistake.

The attached patch fixes these mistakes, corrects some grammatical oddities and
rewrites the param example, which incorrectly stated that the <xsl:param> tag
was replaced with the param value.

thanks,

--Jeff
creator: jeff@socialchange.net.au

text:
Created attachment 812
Documentation patch for docs/manual/CoreTasks/style.html
creator: jeff@socialchange.net.au
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Fixed in CVS or wait for the next nightly build.
Thanks for the report.
